nodes.text: Homon was a location in the galaxy. By around 5 BBY, a flight school was located there which was used to train rebel pilots. In a message from Commander Jun Sato to General Jan Dodonna, Sato found that the RZ-1T trainer was extremely helpful in certifying bush pilots for A-wing starfighters, and stated that if models were available, the flight school on Homon and Farstey could use them.

Later during the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire, the Rebel Alliance considered Homon was considered at least a level five starfighter hub, and was included in a map of the galaxy that listed safe worlds, starfighter hubs at level five or higher, regional headquarters and operations sectors, and deep space caches. The map was later included in the Rebel Files.
